meaningMnemonic: A <radical>woman</radical> is one of the <radical>few</radical> <kanji>peculiar</kanji> things in the world. Everything but a woman can be explained and made sense of. There are only a few truly peculiar things in this world, with woman being one of them.
readingMnemonic: But when you think about it, we're all a little peculiar. Me, you, <reading>myou</reading> (みょう) everybody!
